caption.title: Blood transmission risk.
caption.p: Heat map of the blood transmission risk by Urban Centres and Localities throughout from 2009–2015. (A) ‘best-‘case scenario with Aedes aegypti; (B) ‘worst-‘case scenario with Ae. aegypti; (C) ‘best-‘case scenario with Aedes albopictus; (D) ‘worst-‘case scenario with Ae. Albopictus.
